page.title: 07Crossways 25
page.content: in Antwerp.They are building DIFT's Â£2.7million floating pontoon. Micheal Thomas the DIFT projects marketing manager said that he is delighted with the feed back that he is getting from the launching of the DIFT project.Micheal Thomas said"I have resieved many inquires from potential customers and we are now discussing new services with ferry operators.I am hoping that we shall soon be in a position to make anouncments." He also said"The genaral reaction is very positive and although DIFT is a project which has been in the wings for some time,its apperance on centre stage is now creating tremendous interest in the RO RO market,particularly with M25 nearing completion,as this is the key to the
